alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:18PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Dodge and Wilcox Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, Juliette, Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast to occur. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...Between 10 and 12 feet, Bankfull conditions begin upstream and downstream from the gage at Highway 286. Water begins to spill out into low lying areas of the flood plain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 11 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 14.3 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.3 feet on 07/10/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. Monday afternoon at noon EST.
